import React from "react"; import "./image-carosel.styles.scss"; const ImageCarosel = () => { const mouseMoveHandler = event => { let mouseX = ((event.pageX - event.target.offsetLeft)/event.target.width)*100+"%"; let mouseY = ((event.pageY - event.target.offsetTop)/event.target.height)*100+"%"; console.log(event.target.style.transformOrigin) // event.target.style.left=mouseX; // event.target.style.top=mouseY; event.target.style.transformOrigin = `` } return (
); }; export default ImageCarosel;
